DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1 : The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability single ascend dos hI-con1™ subject Age-Related Macular Degeneration . Phase 2 : The purpose study evaluate safety 3 injection hI-con1™ 2 different dose level .
